title: Game is hardly fun. Here is why.
body: Your team has a 0 kill ADC, and everyone wants to blame top lane who is 10/6 and who got objectives and helped out mid...just because you dare speak up and say something about how poorly bot lane did and is still doing.

replies.body: To be fair alternatively, you also have to deal with 1/10 top lanes sometimes, goes both ways.

I see feeding tops way more than bots, oddly.

Voice chat would be a nightmare, look at dota2 or overwatch. Just screaming brats to the horizon {{champion:268}} .

Voice is opt-in via discord and such, having it forced or opt-out would make low levels and ranked a hellhole and would make it harder for anyone without a mic or an interest in listening to screaming brats communicate with their team.

And i for one dont want proof that i am playing with people a third of my age, i want to give them the benefit of doubt even when they are acting like infants that have not been fed recently.

And the person doing the worst tends to be the one who cries and blames the most - they are insecure and attack others to try and level the playing field. Silently muting them both cuts off their nuisance and crushes their worthless little ego, because nobody feeds them attention.
Voice as I understand it is only going to be between members of your premade, so it likely won't be as bad as all that.

> [{quoted}](name=Tegash,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=pc1zr8Vb,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2018-02-22T11:40:34.365+0000)
>
> Voice as I understand it is only going to be between members of your premade, so it likely won't be as bad as all that.

I know riot was considering premade voice chat, but people already have discord for that..

What a lot want is automatic voice chat for the full team like other games have - incidentally that is a lot of why they are toxic masses of screaming brats, not to mention it is impossible to report or monitor voice chat abuse.

The biggest reasons that league isnt fun is because 1 riot is trying to impose this "summoners code" too seriously as a way of life for everyone, 2 theres no voice chats, 3, you have to deal with too many people who dont understand how the game is supposed to be played and dont understand how objectives work, not to mention riot forces a meta on champs that arent fun to play and then if we dont play the game a certain way were more likely to lose the game than to play what we want (not always the case, but its a very relevant topic)
